title: Codes
body: Where do you redeem codes now? I know the store used to have a "codes" tab but i cant find it anywhere now.

replies.body:
Should be able to help you out with that!

When you open the store, navigate to the upper right hand corner where you see a small button with a person and a cogwheel.  Click on that, and when the new window opens, navigate to the far left hand side where it says, "Redeem Codes" under "Purchase History".

Let me know if you have any other questions!  ^.^
Where I find the coda in the new client coda I can not find them anywhere
